wikitext.*:
'''zigil''' is a word in [[Khuzdul]], occurring as an element in ''Zirakzigil'', the [[Dwarves]]' name for the mountain called ''[[Celebdil]]'' or ''Silvertine'' by other races, and in ''Zigil-nâd'', a rejected [[Dwarvish]] name for ''[[Kibil-nâla]]'', the river known to the [[Elves]] as ''[[Celebrant]]'' and to [[Men]] as the ''Silverlode''.

'''''Zigil''''' therefore evidently means ‘silver’.
{{title|lowercase}}
